value.title: Behind the scenes of how I do Power BI documentation
value.excerpt: Behind the scenes of how I do Power BI documentation  In this video, I'm going to show you how I make documentation changes for Power BI. I'll use the video I did last week as the example in this video. We will make some updates to the Admin Role doc that is out in Power BI.  This process is the same

value.title: Common Data Service for Analytics (CDS-A) and Power BI - an Introduction
value.excerpt: In this video, Matthew Roche joins Adam for a look at the Common Data Service for Analytics. This is an offering that will be coming out in public preview in the Summer of 2018 and will help you to bring together data sources into a common schema. value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how to use conditional columns within Power Query and then copying them for use in other queries or Power BI Desktop files. This is a great technique if you don't want to retype all of the conditional items in the dialog in Power BI.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com
